attributes.action: Let people have days off school for mental health.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government or parliament to do this because lots of people's mental health is affected by being forced to go to school, me included.
attributes.background: If this gets the amount of votes it needs, we need mental health to be a valid reason to have a day off school. You need to check with the child's parents to make sure they're not faking though.

rejection.details:
It is already possible for children to be legitimately absent from school because of a mental health condition, if this means they are not well enough to go to school. This should be reported to the school in the same way as any other absence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Introduce a ‘mental health day’ as a valid reason to be absent from school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583592
